data.url: URL of the Music Assistant server

manual.title: Manually add Music Assistant server
manual.description: Enter the URL to your already running Music Assistant server. If you do not have the Music Assistant server running, you should install it first.

data.url: URL of the Music Assistant server

discovery_confirm.description: Do you want to add the Music Assistant server `{url}` to Home Assistant?
discovery_confirm.title: Discovered Music Assistant server

error.invalid_server_version: The Music Assistant server is not the correct version

abort.reconfiguration_successful: Successfully reconfigured the Music Assistant integration.

invalid_server_version.title: The Music Assistant server is not the correct version
invalid_server_version.description: Check if there are updates available for the Music Assistant server and/or integration.

get_queue_items.name: Get Queue Items
get_queue_items.description: Returns a list of the current items in a player's queue.

limit.name: Limit
limit.description: Limit on the number of items in queue to return.

offset.name: Offset
offset.description: Location in queue to start where zero equals the first item in queue, not the current item..

limit_before.name: Limit Before
limit_before.description: Number of items to pull before current active item in queue..

limit_after.name: Limit After
limit_after.description: Number of items to pull after current active item in queue..

remove_queue_item.name: Remove Queue Item
remove_queue_item.description: Removes an item from the current active queue for a player.

queue_item_id.name: Queue Item ID
queue_item_id.description: ID for the item to remove.

move_queue_item_up.name: Move Queue Item Up
move_queue_item_up.description: Moves an item up in a player's queue.

queue_item_id.name: Queue Item ID
queue_item_id.description: ID for the item to move up.

move_queue_item_down.name: Move Queue Item Down
move_queue_item_down.description: Moves an item down in a player's queue.

queue_item_id.name: Queue Item ID
queue_item_id.description: ID for the item to move down.

move_queue_item_next.name: Move Queue Item Next
move_queue_item_next.description: Moves an item next in a player's queue.

queue_item_id.name: Queue Item ID
queue_item_id.description: ID for the item to move next.

play_queue_item.name: Play Queue Item
play_queue_item.description: Plays an item that's currently in a player queue.

queue_item_id.name: Queue Item ID
queue_item_id.description: ID for the item to play.

send_command.name: Send Command
send_command.description: Sends a command to the Music Assistant API.

command.name: Command
command.description: Command to send to Music Assistant.

config_entry_id.name: Config Entry ID
config_entry_id.description: Config Entry ID for the Music Assistant Queue Items instance.

unfavorite_current_item.name: Unfavorite Current Item
unfavorite_current_item.description: Unfavorites the currently playing item in a player queue.
